rooms.name: Foyer
rooms.description: You are in the foyer of what appears to be a mansion.
rooms.surroundings: A vast, dimly-lit foyer, with a grand staircase and a couple of doors.

rooms.name: Dining Hall
rooms.description: A large dining hall.
rooms.surroundings: A grandfather clock is steadily ticking, its sound echoing through the room.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: A hallway stretches out ahead of you.
rooms.surroundings: A number of doors line the hall.

rooms.name: The kitchen
rooms.description: An industrial-looking kitchen.
rooms.surroundings: The walls, floor, and work surfaces are stained an odd, brownish colour

rooms.name: Gallery
rooms.description: A large room full of various pieces of art.
rooms.surroundings: There's no time to look at these now.

rooms.name: A lounge area
rooms.description: A well-used lounge area.
rooms.surroundings: There's a large fireplace that looks like it hasn't been used in quite some time, and a dusty grand piano, with sheet notes for The Moonlight Sonata. You regret never having learned to play the piano.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: A large hallway, with a musty smell in the air.
rooms.surroundings: There are doors to the West, South, and East

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: A small library, full of useless books.
rooms.surroundings: You notice that 'Tales of the Occult, Vol 2' is missing.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: The bookcase is full, thanks to your careful tidying up. The replaced book has revealed a door in the West wall, which is an amazing feat of engineering.

rooms.name: A hidden room
rooms.description: A well-hidden room.
rooms.surroundings: The room is almost completely empty, save for a piece of paper on the floor, with a series of numbers scribbled on it.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: The room is almost completely empty.

newItem.name: Key code
newItem.description: A piece of paper with 2407 written on it
newItem.messageWhenUsed: You have used the key kode

rooms.name: Statue room
rooms.description: A square room with a prominent centerpiece.
rooms.surroundings: It appears to be a statue of Zeus, throwing a bolt of lightning. Seems fitting for the weather outside.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: A long hallway with large windows.
rooms.surroundings: The weather outside is terrible. You can't see very far into the distance at all. There's a locked door to the North.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: The weather outside is terrible. You can't see very far into the distance at all. There are doors to the North and South.

rooms.name: Swimming Pool
rooms.description: An Olympic-sized swimming pool.
rooms.surroundings: What sort of people live here?

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: A large garage.
rooms.surroundings: The garage is empty, apart from a few tools. You think a crowbar could come in handy. Besides, you're not really sure what the rest of these tools are.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: The garage is empty, apart from a few tools. You're not entirely sure what they're for.

newItem.name: Crowbar
newItem.messageWhenUsed: You prise off the wooden planks

rooms.name: Upstairs foyer
rooms.description: You are at the top of a grand staircase.
rooms.surroundings: You have a good view of the foyer from the top of the staircase. A door to the east has been boarded shut.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: You have a good view of the foyer from the top of the staircase. There are doors to the East and West.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway.
rooms.surroundings: It's very dimly lit, and there are no natural sources of light in here. Your own footsteps echo behind you, and you can't be sure that you're alone.

rooms.name: Another hallway
rooms.description: You are in a hallway.
rooms.surroundings: How many rooms does this place have?

rooms.name: The master bedroom
rooms.description: The master bedroom. A large four-poster bed is in the middle of the room.
rooms.surroundings: The carpet feels thick and plush beneath your feet. There's a set of French doors leading to a balcony, but it is locked.

rooms.name: The master bedroom's en-suite
rooms.description: A fancy en-suite. There's a bidet, so that's quite exciting.
rooms.surroundings: There's a magazine rack here, which is empty except for a single book

newItem.name: Book
newItem.messageWhenUsed: The missing book sits neatly between volumes 1 and 3.

rooms.name: A walk-in wardrobe
rooms.description: A fancy walk-in wardrobe. Most of the clothes in here have been eaten away at by moths.
rooms.surroundings: The smell of damp fills your nostrils.

rooms.name: Balcony
rooms.description: A balcony leading off from the master bedroom.
rooms.surroundings: I don't know how you got here, but you're not getting out. It's too high to survive the fall, and the door has locked behind you.

rooms.name: Aquarium
rooms.description: A large aquarium, full of exotic fish.
rooms.surroundings: I'm not sure how they're still alive, but the dim blue lights of their tanks is very soothing. There's a faint whirring noise coming from the tank.

rooms.name: Trophy room
rooms.description: A large trophy room, full of animals that have been stuffed and treated.
rooms.surroundings: You notice that a moose head has fallen onto the floor, and it seems like a good idea to take it with you.

newItem.name: Moose head
newItem.description: The moose's cold, dead eyes stare into your soul.
newItem.messageWhenUsed: You place the moose head onto the empty plaque.

rooms.name: Hallway
rooms.description: You are in yet another hallway.
rooms.surroundings: 'No wonder it's so filthy around here! I couldn't be bothered to clean these hallways either', you think to yourself.

rooms.name: Guest bedroom
rooms.description: A well-decorated guest bedroom.
rooms.surroundings: There's an unusual-looking plaque on the wall. It looks like it's missing something. There's a door to the North, but it's locked. There's a small key on a bedside table.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemPickedUp: There's an unusual-looking plaque on the wall. It looks like it's missing something. There's a door to the North, but it's locked.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: The moose's head is staring at you from its place on the wall, and the door to the North is unlocked.

newItem.name: Key
newItem.messageWhenUsed: You have unlocked the door to the pool.

rooms.name: Study
rooms.description: You are in a study, with a desk covered in scattered papers and cut-outs from news stories.
rooms.surroundings: There's a computer on a desk, with a prompt for a password on the screen.
rooms.surroundingsWhenItemUsed: The computer has switched itself off, but a door to the North has revealed itself.

rooms.name: Laboratory
rooms.description: This is unusual. There's a laboratory here!
rooms.surroundings: Piles of papers and folders are scattered everywhere. The information held within is terrifying. This is just the beginning...
